alert.note: Alert for Coastal New Hanover; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of New Hanover County through 400 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hightsville, or near Wilmington, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Wrightsville Beach, Johnny Mercer Pier, North Masonboro Island, Mayfaire, Hightsville, Cape Fear Community College North Campus, Wrightsboro, Wilmington International Airport, Murrayville, Masonboro, Castle Hayne, University Of North Carolina At Wilmington, Windemere, Bayshore, Ogden, Landfall, Kings Grant, Seagate and Porters Neck. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 414 and 416. Interstate 140 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal New Hanover; Inland New Hanover
